title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area 

of Mallow) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (local electoral area mallow) order 2020

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 22 April 2020.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 22 April 2020.

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Mallow (as provided
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Mallow (as provided 
for by the County of Cork Local Electoral Areas and Municipal Districts Order 
2019 (S.I. No. 28 of 2019)) is prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period 
commencing on 22 April 2020 and ending on 31 December 2021. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 April, 2020. 

EOGHAN MURPHY, 

Minister for Housing, Planning and Local Government. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th April, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [138] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting local electoral area mallow (as provided county cork local electoral area municipal district order 2019 (s.i no 28 2019)) prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 22 april 2020 ending 31 december 2021 given official seal 21 april 2020 eoghan murphy minister housing planning local government notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th april 2020 138 3

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Local Electoral Area of Mallow 
as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 
(as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and Development (Housing) and 
Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period commencing on 22 April 2020 
and ending on 31 December 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [138]
